Summary
Openblas built with intel segfaults. 
```

Your branch is up to date with 'origin/develop'.                                                                                                       
From https://github.com/spack/spack

 * branch                develop    -> FETCH_HEAD                                                                                                      
Already up to date.                                                                                                                                    
Everything up-to-date                                                                                                                                  
[sajid@xrmlite ~]$ export F90="/home/sajid/packages/spack/lib/spack/env/intel/ifort"                                                                   
[sajid@xrmlite ~]$ spack install --keep-stage openblas%intel@18.0.3                                                                                    
==> Installing openblas                                                                                                                                
==> Using cached archive: /home/sajid/packages/spack/var/spack/cache/openblas/openblas-0.3.2.tar.gz                                                    
==> Staging archive: /home/sajid/packages/spack/var/spack/stage/openblas-0.3.2-wcejamojodhvdmdklxakqvyxs6u7izyr/v0.3.2.tar.gz                          
==> Created stage in /home/sajid/packages/spack/var/spack/stage/openblas-0.3.2-wcejamojodhvdmdklxakqvyxs6u7izyr                                        
==> Applied patch openblas_icc_fortran.patch                                                                                                           
==> Applied patch make.patch                                                                                                                           
==> Applied patch openblas_icc_fortran2.patch                                                                                                          
==> Building openblas [MakefilePackage]                                                                                                                
==> Executing phase: 'edit'                                                                                                                            
==> Executing phase: 'build'                                                                                                                           
==> Executing phase: 'install'                                                                                                                         
==> Successfully installed openblas                                                                                                                    
  Fetch: 0.05s.  Build: 19m 45.21s.  Total: 19m 45.26s.                                                                                                
[+] /home/sajid/packages/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/intel-18.0.3/openblas-0.3.2-wcejamojodhvdmdklxakqvyxs6u7izyr                             
[sajid@xrmlite ~]$ Connection reset by 129.105.65.14 port 22                                                                                           
                                                                                                                                                       
[sajid@xrmlite ~]$ ./packages/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/intel-18.0.3/openblas-0.3.2-wcejamojodhvdmdklxakqvyxs6u7izyr/lib/libopenblas.so     
Segmentation fault (core dumped)                                                                                                                       
```

[Build log](https://transfer.sh/12qL3k/opeblas32-intel18-centos74-spack-build.out)
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```
$ export F90="path_to_ifort"                                                                   
$ spack install --keep-stage openblas%intel@18.0.3                                                                                    
```

### Information on your system

1) x86_64-CentOS-7.4
2) Intel module file was generated as per the official intel docs.
title: openblas@0.3.2 on develop builds incorrectly with intel@18.0.3
